abstract: Los Angeles Lakers endure ugly season as shooting guard Kobe Bryant continues to struggle both defensively and offensively; Bryant has not yet decided whether he will retire, though many expect this year to be his last.
lead_paragraph: Despite poor numbers, Bryant remains the focal point of the Lakers, whom the Warriors beat to improve to 16-0 this week and who could provide a win for the 0-16 76ers next week.

headline.main: Kobe Bryant’s Decline Puts Lakers on Wrong Side of History
headline.print_headline: As Bryant Declines, Lakers Fall From the N.B.A.’s Elite

snippet: Despite poor numbers, Bryant remains the focal point of the Lakers, whom the Warriors beat to improve to 16-0 this week and who could provide a win for the 0-16 76ers next week.
